pr_title: Add docs for Hive metastore caching

timeline.bodyText:
We don't need to quote when the default value is number as existing properties. The following max-threads is also the same.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            ``hive.metastore-cache-maximum-size``              Hive metastore cache maximu size                             ``10000``
          
          
            
            ``hive.metastore-cache-maximum-size``              Hive metastore cache maximum size                             10,000
timeline.author: ebyhr
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -238,7 +238,15 @@ Property Name                                      Description
                                                    to the Hive metastore service.
 
 ``hive.metastore.client.keytab``                   Hive metastore client keytab location.
-================================================== ============================================================
+
+``hive.metastore-cache-ttl``                       Time to live Hive metadata cache                             ``0ms``
+
+``hive.metastore-refresh-interval``                Refresh interval of Hive metastore cache                     ``1s``
+
+``hive.metastore-cache-maximum-size``              Hive metastore cache maximu size                             ``10000``

timeline.bodyText: There's no default value for this property. How about  How often to refresh the Hive metastore cache?
timeline.author: ebyhr
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -238,7 +238,15 @@ Property Name                                      Description

-================================================== ============================================================
+
+``hive.metastore-cache-ttl``                       Time to live Hive metadata cache                             ``0ms``
+
+``hive.metastore-refresh-interval``                Refresh interval of Hive metastore cache                     ``1s``

                                                    to the Hive metastore service.

-================================================== ============================================================
+
+``hive.metastore-cache-ttl``                       Time to live Hive metadata cache                             ``0ms``

timeline.bodyText: How about Maximum number of threads to refresh Hive metastore cache?
timeline.author: ebyhr
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -238,7 +238,15 @@ Property Name                                      Description
                                                    to the Hive metastore service.
 
 ``hive.metastore.client.keytab``                   Hive metastore client keytab location.
-================================================== ============================================================
+
+``hive.metastore-cache-ttl``                       Time to live Hive metadata cache                             ``0ms``
+
+``hive.metastore-refresh-interval``                Refresh interval of Hive metastore cache                     ``1s``
+
+``hive.metastore-cache-maximum-size``              Hive metastore cache maximu size                             ``10000``
+
+``hive.metastore-refresh-max-threads``             The Max number of refresh threads for Hive metastore cache   ``100``

timeline.message: Add docs for Hive metastore caching
